title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 503.4 - Adjournments of hearings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 503.4 - Adjournments of hearings

State Regulations
(a) Requests
for adjournments are to be made to the presiding officer at least four working
days prior to the date of any scheduled hearing. Requests for adjournments will
be denied, if, in the opinion of the presiding officer, there is not good and
sufficient cause for such adjournment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
503.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
